page.title: 06HOUSING
page.content: Within the area,houses vary considerably in size & style.Moreover they can be divided into 3 general categories.The 1st is of very small terraced houses with little or no garden,most of which were built during the{Victorian}period.The 2nd has small gardens but fairly large houses;most of these houses being built fairly recently (post-war).The 3rd have large gardens & houses;these were built over a wide time span,but nearly all of them are pre-war.The most notable area of the 1st category is{Selly Oak},with high density,poor quality housing.The {Envelope scheme},started in1982,hopes to refurbish this area & preserve the traditional community,without changing it as drastically as a comprehensive redevelopment scheme would do{.Balsall {Heath}is the only other area with a large amount of the 1st category./cont
